xwikidoc.name: GetPageService
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: GetPageService
xwikidoc.content: #set($requestOK = false) ##Gets the rendered content of the page #if($request.pagename && $request.action == "getRenderedContent") #if($xwiki.hasAccessLevel("edit","$request.pagename")) #set($doc = $xwiki.getDocument("$request.pagename")) $doc.getRenderedContent() #set($requestOK = true) #else $msg.get("RESPONSE 102 - You don't have edit right on this page.") #end #end #if($request.pagename && $request.action == "getDocURL" && $request.xwikiAction) $xwiki.getURL("$request.pagename","$request.xwikiAction") #set($requestOK = true) #end #if($requestOK == false) $msg.get("RESPONSE 100 - Error! Wrong request.") #end
